mapper.select: select * from tb_busker_show order by enroll_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_busker_show (enroll_date, title, content, place, lat, lon, gu, doo, weather, weather_icon,temperature, busker_no) values (#{enrollDate}, #{title}, #{content}, #{place}, #{lat}, #{lon}, #{gu}, #{doo},#{weather},#{weatherIcon}, #{temperature}, 1)
mapper.update: update tb_busker_show set enroll_date = #{enrollDate}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, place = #{place}, lat = #{lat}, lon = #{lon}, gu = #{gu}, doo = #{doo}, weather = #{weather}, weather_icon = #{weatherIcon}, temperature = #{temperature} where show_no = #{showNo}
